languages.text:
Арбитр мчится сквозь союзников и врагов по прямой на расстояние до 5 клеток, не провоцируя {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}атаки возможности{/g}. Каждый враг на его пути должен пройти тест на сопротивление ловкости или упасть {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}на землю{/g} до начала следующего {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода врага{/g}.
! Эта {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способность{/g} может быть использована только при наличии щита.

traits.locale_text:
Арбитр мчится сквозь союзников и врагов по прямой на расстояние до 5 клеток, не провоцируя {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}атаки возможности{/g}. Каждый враг на его пути должен пройти тест на сопротивление ловкости или упасть {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}на землю{/g} до начала следующего {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода врага{/g}.
! Эта {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способность{/g} может быть использована только при наличии щита.

languages.text:
The Arbitrator dashes through allies and enemies in a straight line for up to 5 cells without provoking {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g}. Each enemy they dash through must pass an {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} or fall {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g} until the start of that enemy's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.
! This {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} can only be used with a shield equipped.
languages.original_text:
Арбитр бежит по прямой на расстояние до 5 клеток (может пересекать клетки с союзниками и врагами), не провоцируя {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}атаки по возможности{/g}. Каждый противник на пути совершает проверку {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Ловкости{/g} на {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}сопротивление{/g} и в случае провала оказывается {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}опрокинут{/g} до начала своего следующего {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g}.
! Эту {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способность{/g} можно использовать только при наличии щита.

traits.locale_text:
The Arbitrator dashes through allies and enemies in a straight line for up to 5 cells without provoking attacks of opportunity. Each enemy on their way falls {g|f:8de915da52f24d9bb925d13fb2c8cf98}prone{/g} until the start of that enemy's next turn.
! This ability can only be used with a shield equipped.

The Arbitrator dashes through allies and enemies in a straight line for up to 5 cells without provoking {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g}. Each enemy they dash through must pass an Agility resistance test or fall {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g} until the start of that enemy's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.
! This {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} can only be used with a shield equipped.

The Arbitrator dashes through allies and enemies in a straight line for up to 5 cells without provoking {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g}. Each enemy they dash through must pass an Agility resistance test or fall {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g} until the start of that enemy's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.
! This {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} can only be used with a shield equipped.

languages.text:
Yargıcı, düz bir çizgide en fazla 5 hücreye kadar dost ve düşman birimlere doğru atılır. Bu esnada {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}fırsat saldırılarını{/g} tetiklemez. Yarıp geçtiği her düşman, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Çeviklik{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}direnç testinden{/g} geçmelidir. Aksi takdirde {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}yere devrilir{/g} ve kendisinin bir sonraki {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turunun{/g} başlangıcına dek kalkamaz.
! Bu {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}kabiliyet{/g}, yalnızca kalkan kuşanılmışsa kullanılabilir.
languages.original_text:
The Arbitrator dashes through allies and enemies in a straight line for up to 5 cells without provoking {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g}. Each enemy they dash through must pass an {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} or fall {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g} until the start of that enemy's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.
! This {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} can only be used with a shield equipped.

traits.locale_text:
Yargıcı, düz bir çizgide en fazla 5 hücreye kadar dost ve düşman birimlere doğru atılır. Bu esnada {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}fırsat saldırılarını{/g} tetiklemez. Yarıp geçtiği her düşman, Çeviklik direnç testinden geçmelidir. Aksi takdirde {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}yere devrilir{/g} ve kendisinin bir sonraki {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turunun{/g} başlangıcına dek kalkamaz.
! Bu {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}kabiliyet{/g}, yalnızca kalkan kuşanılmışsa kullanılabilir.

Yargıcı, düz bir çizgide en fazla 5 hücreye kadar dost ve düşman birimlere doğru atılır. Bu esnada {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}fırsat saldırılarını{/g} tetiklemez. Yoluna çıkan her düşman, Çeviklik direnç testinden geçmelidir. Aksi takdirde {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}yere devrilir{/g} ve kendisinin bir sonraki {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turunun{/g} başlangıcına dek kalkamaz.
! Bu {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}kabiliyet{/g}, yalnızca kalkan kuşanılmışsa kullanılabilir.

Yargıcı, düz bir çizgide en fazla 5 hücreye kadar dost ve düşman birimlere doğru atılır. Bu esnada {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}fırsat saldırılarını{/g} tetiklemez. Yarıp geçtiği her düşman, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Çeviklik{/g} direnç testinden geçmelidir. Aksi takdirde {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}yere devrilir{/g} ve kendisinin bir sonraki {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turunun{/g} başlangıcına dek kalkamaz.
! Bu {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}kabiliyet{/g}, yalnızca kalkan kuşanılmışsa kullanılabilir.

languages.text:
El Arbitrator recorre hasta 5 casillas a través de aliados y enemigos en línea recta sin provocar {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}ataques de oportunidad{/g}. Todo enemigo al que atraviese debe superar una {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}prueba de fortaleza{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agilidad{/g} o quedar {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}derribado{/g} hasta el comienzo del próximo {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g} de dicho enemigo.
! Esta {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidad{/g} solo se puede usar con un escudo equipado.
languages.original_text:
The Arbitrator dashes through allies and enemies in a straight line for up to 5 cells without provoking {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g}. Each enemy they dash through must pass an {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} or fall {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g} until the start of that enemy's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.
! This {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} can only be used with a shield equipped.

traits.locale_text:
El Arbitrator recorre hasta 5 casillas a través de aliados y enemigos en línea recta sin provocar {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}ataques de oportunidad{/g}. Todo enemigo al que atraviese debe superar una prueba de fortaleza de Agilidad o quedar {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}derribado{/g} hasta el comienzo del próximo {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g} de dicho enemigo.
! Esta {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidad{/g} solo se puede usar con un escudo equipado.

languages.text:
法务官向前冲锋，穿过前方所有盟友与敌人，最多移动5格。此次移动不会触发{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}借机攻击{/g}。所有被法务官穿身而过的敌人都需要进行{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}敏捷{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抗性检定{/g}，若未能通过检定，则会陷入{g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}倒地{/g}状态，效果持续至该名敌人下个{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}开始。
！此{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}只能在装备盾牌的情况下使用。
languages.original_text:
The Arbitrator dashes through allies and enemies in a straight line for up to 5 cells without provoking {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g}. Each enemy they dash through must pass an {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} or fall {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g} until the start of that enemy's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.
! This {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} can only be used with a shield equipped.

法务官向前冲锋，穿过前方所有盟友与敌人，最多移动5格。此次移动不会触发{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}借机攻击{/g}。所有被法务官穿身而过的敌人都需要进行敏捷抗性检定，若未能通过检定，则会陷入{g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}倒地{/g}状态，效果持续至该名敌人下个{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}开始。
！此{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}只能在装备盾牌的情况下使用。

法务官向前冲锋，穿过前方所有盟友与敌人，最多移动5格。此次移动不会触发{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}借机攻击{/g}。所有被法务官穿身而过的敌人都需要进行敏捷抗性检定，若未能通过检定，则会陷入{g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}倒地{/g}状态，效果持续至该名敌人下个{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}开始。
！此{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}只能在装备盾牌的情况下使用。

法务官向前冲锋，穿过前方所有盟友与敌人，最多移动5格。此次移动不会触发{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}借机攻击{/g}。所有被法务官穿身而过的敌人都需要进行敏捷抗性检定，若未能通过检定，则会陷入{g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}倒地{/g}状态，效果持续至该名敌人下个{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}开始。
！此{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}只能在装备盾牌的情况下使用。

languages.text:
L'arbitrator se déplace en ligne droite d'un maximum de 5 cases en traversant les alliés et les ennemis, sans provoquer d'{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attaques d'opportunité{/g}. Tous les ennemis sur son passage doivent réussir un {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}test de résistance{/g} d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agilité{/g}, sans quoi ils sont {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}paralysés{/g} jusqu'au début de leur prochain {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g}.
! Cette {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacité{/g} ne peut être utilisée qu'avec un bouclier.
languages.original_text:
The Arbitrator dashes through allies and enemies in a straight line for up to 5 cells without provoking {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g}. Each enemy they dash through must pass an {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} or fall {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g} until the start of that enemy's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.
! This {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} can only be used with a shield equipped.

traits.locale_text:
L'arbitrator se déplace en ligne droite d'un maximum de 5 cases en traversant les alliés et les ennemis, sans provoquer d'{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attaques d'opportunité{/g}. Tous les ennemis sur son passage doivent réussir un test de résistance d'Agilité, sans quoi ils sont {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}paralysés{/g} jusqu'au début de leur prochain {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g}.
! Cette {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacité{/g} ne peut être utilisée qu'avec un bouclier.

! Cette {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacité{/g} ne peut être utilisée qu'avec un bouclier.

L'arbitrator se déplace en ligne droite d'un maximum de 5 cases en traversant les alliés et les ennemis, sans provoquer d'{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attaques d'opportunité{/g}. ! Cette {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacité{/g} ne peut être utilisée qu'avec un bouclier.

L'arbitrator se déplace en ligne droite d'un maximum de 5 cases en traversant les alliés et les ennemis, sans provoquer d'{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attaques d'opportunité{/g}. Tous les ennemis sur son passage doivent réussir un test de résistance d'Agilité, sans quoi ils sont {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}paralysés{/g} jusqu'au début de leur prochain {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g}.
! Cette {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacité{/g} ne peut être utilisée qu'avec un bouclier.

languages.text:
アービトレイターは、{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}機会攻撃{/g}を誘発することなく、最大5セルまで直線ラインの味方と敵を通り抜ける。進路上のすべての敵は、次の自分の{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}の開始時まで{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}敏捷性{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抵抗判定{/g}を受けなければならず、失敗すると{g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}脆弱化{/g}する。
！この{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}はシールドを装備している場合のみ使用可能。
languages.original_text:
The Arbitrator dashes through allies and enemies in a straight line for up to 5 cells without provoking {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g}. Each enemy they dash through must pass an {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} or fall {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g} until the start of that enemy's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.
! This {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} can only be used with a shield equipped.

traits.locale_text:
アービトレイターは、{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}機会攻撃{/g}を誘発することなく、最大5セルまで直線ラインの味方と敵を通り抜ける。進路上のすべての敵は、次の自分の{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}の開始時まで敏捷性抵抗判定を受けなければならず、失敗すると{g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}脆弱化{/g}する。
！この{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}はシールドを装備している場合のみ使用可能。

アービトレイターは、{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}機会攻撃{/g}を誘発することなく、最大5セルまで直線ラインの味方と敵を通り抜ける。進路上のすべての敵は、次の自分の{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}の開始時まで敏捷性抵抗判定を受けなければならず、失敗すると{g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}脆弱化{/g}する。
！この{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}はシールドを装備している場合のみ使用可能。

languages.text:
Der Arbitrator sprintet in gerader Linie bis zu 5 Felder durch Verbündete und Gegner, ohne {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}Gelegenheitsangriffe{/g} zu provozieren. Alle Gegner, durch die er sprintet, müssen eine {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}Widerstandsprobe{/g} auf {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Beweglichkeit{/g} bestehen oder werden bis zum Beginn ihres nächsten {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zuges{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}hingestreckt{/g}.
! Diese {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeit{/g} kann nur mit ausgerüstetem Schild eingesetzt werden.
languages.original_text:
The Arbitrator dashes through allies and enemies in a straight line for up to 5 cells without provoking {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g}. Each enemy they dash through must pass an {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} or fall {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g} until the start of that enemy's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.
! This {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} can only be used with a shield equipped.

traits.locale_text:
Der Arbitrator sprintet in gerader Linie bis zu 5 Felder durch Verbündete und Gegner, ohne {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}Gelegenheitsangriffe{/g} zu provozieren. Alle Gegner, durch die er sprintet, müssen eine Widerstandsprobe auf Beweglichkeit bestehen oder werden bis zum Beginn ihres nächsten {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zuges{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}hingestreckt{/g}.
! Diese {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeit{/g} kann nur mit ausgerüstetem Schild eingesetzt werden.

Der Arbitrator sprintet in gerader Linie bis zu 5 Felder durch Verbündete und Gegner, ohne {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}Gelegenheitsangriffe{/g} zu provozieren. Alle Gegner auf seinem Weg müssen eine Widerstandsprobe auf Beweglichkeit bestehen oder werden bis zum Beginn ihres nächsten {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zuges{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}hingestreckt{/g}.
! Diese {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeit{/g} kann nur mit ausgerüstetem Schild eingesetzt werden.

Каждый противник на пути совершает проверку {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Ловкости{/g} на {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}сопротивление{/g} и в случае провала оказывается {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}опрокинут{/g} до начала своего следующего {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g}.
